description: Attempting to access resources from invalid or destroyed context. Common in async callbacks after activity destroyed.
commonCauses: Using Application context for themed resources
Resources accessed during process death recovery
solutions: Use activity context for themed resources
Check context validity before resource access
Use applicationContext only for non-themed resources
Store resource IDs, resolve in valid context
prevention: Use appropriate context type for resource needs
Never hold long-lived Activity context references
Test configuration changes and process death
Use WeakReference for context in callbacks
examples: val color = ContextCompat.getColor(requireContext(), R.color.primary) // Use requireContext in fragments
class MyCallback(context: Context) { private val appContext = context.applicationContext }
